analysis.description:
RBAC.roles (/unique_chucks/28/0x5ac3c4518ebaec379f9dd0e60e4b72f1eb432592.sol#149-152) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- checkRole (/unique_chucks/28/0x5ac3c4518ebaec379f9dd0e60e4b72f1eb432592.sol#166-170)
	- hasRole (/unique_chucks/28/0x5ac3c4518ebaec379f9dd0e60e4b72f1eb432592.sol#179-184)
	- addRole (/unique_chucks/28/0x5ac3c4518ebaec379f9dd0e60e4b72f1eb432592.sol#191-197)
	- removeRole (/unique_chucks/28/0x5ac3c4518ebaec379f9dd0e60e4b72f1eb432592.sol#203-209)
bonusTotal in VeraCrowdsale.computeBonuses (/unique_chucks/28/0x5ac3c4518ebaec379f9dd0e60e4b72f1eb432592.sol#460) is a local variable never initialiazed
bonusIds in VeraCrowdsale.computeBonuses (/unique_chucks/28/0x5ac3c4518ebaec379f9dd0e60e4b72f1eb432592.sol#460) is a local variable never initialiazed

VeraCrowdsale.withdrawTokens (/unique_chucks/28/0x5ac3c4518ebaec379f9dd0e60e4b72f1eb432592.sol#425-432) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_to,amount) (/unique_chucks/28/0x5ac3c4518ebaec379f9dd0e60e4b72f1eb432592.sol#430-432)

VeraCrowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/28/0x5ac3c4518ebaec379f9dd0e60e4b72f1eb432592.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_investor,tokens) (/unique_chucks/28/0x5ac3c4518ebaec379f9dd0e60e4b72f1eb432592.sol)

Reentrancy in VeraCrowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/28/0x5ac3c4518ebaec379f9dd0e60e4b72f1eb432592.sol):
	External calls:
	- token.transfer(_investor,tokens) (/unique_chucks/28/0x5ac3c4518ebaec379f9dd0e60e4b72f1eb432592.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- centsRaised (/unique_chucks/28/0x5ac3c4518ebaec379f9dd0e60e4b72f1eb432592.sol)
	- tokensSold (/unique_chucks/28/0x5ac3c4518ebaec379f9dd0e60e4b72f1eb432592.sol)
